item.description: Nginx 配置文件的一大特点是：必须要以分号结尾。 变量 Name Description $scheme The scheme of HTTP request, could be http, https $host $request_uri ] 逻辑判断 ngx_http_rewrite_module rewrite server { listen 80; server_name surenpi.com; location / { rewrite ^ https://linuxsuren.github.io/blog/; } } return Syntax: return code [text]; return code URL; return URL; Default: - Context: server, location, if if ($host = "github.
